short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overlay highlighted text with voice narration onto background gameplay

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Absorb Content Effortlessly with Engaging Text Overlays on Gameplay Videos!

Our extension is designed to help you focus and absorb information quickly by overlaying engaging text and voice narration onto background gameplay. Whether it's educational content, news, or just an interesting story, this tool pairs text with simple gameplay, making it easier to stay focused, digest information, and enjoy learning or entertainment content without drifting off.
